copernicus-eo.description: Copernicus Earth Observation MCP Server - Access satellite imagery from Copernicus Sentinel missions with comprehensive search, download, and file management capabilities.

copernicus-eo.search_copernicus_images: Search for Copernicus satellite images for a given region. Supports point, polygon, and bounding box geometries with date range and cloud cover filtering.
copernicus-eo.get_image_details: Get comprehensive metadata for a specific satellite image including download URL, processing level, and technical specifications.
copernicus-eo.get_mission_info: Get detailed information about Copernicus satellite missions including capabilities, sensors, and applications.
copernicus-eo.get_recent_images: Get the most recent satellite images for a region with configurable date range and mission filtering.
copernicus-eo.check_coverage: Check satellite image coverage for a region over time with monthly aggregation and mission-specific analysis.
copernicus-eo.download_image: Download a Copernicus satellite image by ID. Supports full products, quicklook previews, and compressed versions. Requires authentication.
copernicus-eo.batch_download_images: Download multiple Copernicus satellite images concurrently with progress tracking and error handling. Requires authentication.
copernicus-eo.check_download_availability: Check if Copernicus satellite images are available for download with detailed status and size information.
copernicus-eo.get_product_download_links: Get all available download links for a Copernicus satellite image including full, compressed, and quicklook URLs.
copernicus-eo.search_and_download: Search for Copernicus satellite images and automatically download the best match based on recency, cloud cover, and processing level.
copernicus-eo.list_downloaded_files: List downloaded Copernicus satellite image files with filtering by file type, size, and modification time.
copernicus-eo.cleanup_downloads: Clean up downloaded files based on age, size, or file type criteria with dry-run mode for safety.
copernicus-eo.get_download_statistics: Get comprehensive statistics about downloaded files including breakdown by mission, file type, and time period.

environment_variables.COPERNICUS_USERNAME: Your Copernicus Data Space email address

authentication.notes: Search operations work without authentication. Download operations require valid credentials.

notes.performance: Full product downloads can be several GBs. Quicklook downloads are recommended for initial testing.
notes.authentication: Credentials are required for download operations. Set environment variables before starting the server.
notes.api_limits: Respect Copernicus Data Space API rate limits. Use appropriate date ranges and geographic extents.
notes.file_management: Regular cleanup is recommended to manage disk space. Use cleanup_downloads with dry_run=True first.
